availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Gibson Gaines in Woodford County, Kentucky, on August 26, 1843. Married to Catharine M. Gaines. Father of Bernard Gaines, John C. B. Gaines, and Ann E. Gaines. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Confirmed as a notary public in Union County on February 5, 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 188.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Woodford County Marriages, Film #000252324.
KYR-0001-017-0062.
